extendedInfo.description: For all dancing queens! If you love dancing, you should definitely use this application to get the perfect background design for your phone. Pick the picture you like best, make any changes you want, and save your new wallpaper with elements of this popular and wonderful type of art!- Easy-to-browse interface enables you to find the desired background in no time!- Customize the wallpaper to fit your taste and screen!- Zoom, un-zoom, rotate, move, scale, adjust brightness and save your wallpaper design!Dance is broadly conceived as physical movement organized into patterns in time and space. It is the art form that communicates through the body. It is an integral part of the live and recorded performing arts and cultural industries. It is often collaborative and provides creative and work opportunities for artists working in a range of other art forms including music, film or theatre. In addition, dancers and choreographers frequently contribute to other art forms.Born in the early 20th century, modern dance is a style that centers on a dancer's own interpretations instead of structured steps, as in traditional ballet dancing. Modern dancers reject the limitations of classical ballet and favor movements derived from the expression of their inner feelings. They are encouraged to use their emotions and moods to design their own steps and routines. It is not unusual for them to invent new steps for their routines, instead of following a structured code of technique, as in ballet. They tend to use dancing to express their innermost emotions, often to get closer to their inner-selves. Before attempting to choreograph a routine, the modern dancer decides which emotions to try to convey to the audience. They tend to choose a subject near and dear to their hearts, such as a lost love or a personal failure. The dancer will choose music that relates to the story they wish to tell, or choose to use no music at all, and then choose a costume to reflect their chosen emotions. Watch various pictures of greatest performers and their exquisite movements on stage! Make you new ideal dance wallpaper!

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Too many ads to do anything, freezes up, spams notification bar, pop ups constantly.  Doesnt even deserve a star
reviews.author: Jessie Sabree

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: Amazing pictures, it\'s too bad there are awful adds, pop ups and downloaded junk apps!
reviews.author: Whitney McCommon

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Do not get this app downloads random apps to phone and each picture you click sends to a differrnt app in the store. Uninstalled three minutes after downloading
reviews.author: michelle frye

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Beautiful, awesome wallpapers. Thank you good man!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: My daughter\'s like dancing and this is their favorite app...
reviews.author: Dariush Kaveh

reviews.title: All in all good app
reviews.comment: There are a few ads here and there, but nothin that I can\'t handle, wallpapers are great so I\'ll be using this app in the future
reviews.author: Kelly Burchill
